about_the_game: This is just a Demo Level. You ll miss features all around. At the Kirmis, one year by another fair, there is a world to gamble away loot for every day. Explore a strange world where there is grass to find, locations to explore, strange people to meet and all sorts of secrets to uncover. Get high and fly around to find your way or collect the grass and explore level after level of a totally cannaly story. Believe me or not, this is what can happen to you if the car dies on the way to the fair.
detailed_description: This is just a Demo Level. You ll miss features all around. At the Kirmis, one year by another fair, there is a world to gamble away loot for every day. Explore a strange world where there is grass to find, locations to explore, strange people to meet and all sorts of secrets to uncover. Get high and fly around to find your way or collect the grass and explore level after level of a totally cannaly story. Believe me or not, this is what can happen to you if the car dies on the way to the fair.
name: Kirmis Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 32 GB available space

short_description: This is a Demo Level. You ll miss features all around. Don`t miss the Early Access!
